messages: 4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:23): why can't we just leave it
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:23): without all that extra IE stuff
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:23): and i'm not talking about the ones before
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:23): i'm talking about that last one
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:24): not sure what the point is and if it hurts to just leave <html>
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:26): be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde: i'm not talking bout the doctype
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:26): i'm talking about the html tag
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:27): I have no idea why people use <!--[if gt IE 8]><!--> <html class="no-js" lang="en"> <!--<![endif]-->
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:27): it smells like a perfect cargo cult
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (22:28): That doesn't make sense, does it?
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:28): you are expecting IE8 vistors?
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:29): there's already a <!--[if IE 8]>    <html class="no-js ie8" lang="en"> <![endif]-->
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:29): actually I don't even know what <!--[if gt IE 8]><!--> means.
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:29): i did some research basically I 'think' it means
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:30): which is where i'm like huh? what's the point of it then
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:31): i will wait for mr. paul irish's comment
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:31): I will never again try to make something work in IE
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:32): everything looks so clean that way
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:33): be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde: if you say you don't support ie8 then it aint smart, as I always say
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:33): it's the most popular browser period.
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:33): and no i'm not talking about ie6. that's dead
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:33): yes, but all of the IE users don't apriciate any software
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:34): not everyone is smart, actually majority are dumb
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:34): which is why when you make a website you should support at least IE8
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (22:34): you can argue IE7 (which i still support myself)
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:38): thats the way to do it
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:39): never again IE bug reports
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:40): You can tell me if my website works in IE? :D
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:43): IE one time told me there was a dangerous script on the page then refused to show it to me.
be2db18d09c0b366b3239eeb8b3b2dde (22:43): It was my own website, it had 1 document.write on it.
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:23): 47e6a4aabaebc333d88ea9d2feb1e8ec: I was asking paul but he isn't around, do you have any idea what's the point of this code
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:23): why not just leave that last html tag <html class="no-js" lang="en">
47e6a4aabaebc333d88ea9d2feb1e8ec (23:24): so it does not duplicate for ie6 and 7
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:24): as in having two html tags?
47e6a4aabaebc333d88ea9d2feb1e8ec (23:27): no because IE8 will evaluate if ie 6 and if ie 7 so it will only render once
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:28): ok so for example lets say i have a
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:29): do i change last one to
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (23:31): 4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c: Y U NO curl http://html5boilerplate 2>/dev/null | head -5
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:33): 47e6a4aabaebc333d88ea9d2feb1e8ec: fyi I left it plain, and I don't see it any duplicate html tags
4fb794cbb355ba02b355660cbfca0c6c (23:33): when viewing the actual generated HTML
